trigger.title: Trigger: Player Generates Container Loot
trigger.description: Triggers when the player generates the contents of a container with a loot table set.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

loot_table.title: Loot Table
loot_table.description: The resource location of the generated loot table.
